channel.title: Will You Enjoy the Christmas 2006 Event in Old School Runescape?
channel.description: With all the spookiness of Halloween over now, it's time to look forward into the festive season and think about what you want to do for Christmas. Unfortunately, the developers of runescape cannot offer the Christmas 2007 event as that came after the build of our current archive. So will you accept the returning of Christmas 2006 event?

item.title: Will You Enjoy the Christmas 2006 Event in Old School Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @Chronikk_HD Chronikk_HD
item.description:
@Chronikk_HD wrote:

And not to mention who CAN’T have fun throwing snowballs? I mean seriously! Bottom line it’s a classic event, to me it’s fun but I can understand why some people say it won’t be as fun which is fine.

Read full topic
item.source: Will You Enjoy the Christmas 2006 Event in Old School Runescape?

item.title: Will You Enjoy the Christmas 2006 Event in Old School Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Jagex managed to squeeze a somewhat trademark holiday event, which was pretty cool because it got players all in one area, talking about the event and other things. I for one enjoyed it, as simple as it was.

Read full topic
item.source: Will You Enjoy the Christmas 2006 Event in Old School Runescape?

item.title: Will You Enjoy the Christmas 2006 Event in Old School Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @Chronikk_HD Chronikk_HD
item.description:
@Chronikk_HD wrote:

relmitos:

I rather see the Christmas 2004 event. Just santa handing you a gift wrapped toy, no bs puzzles around it.

Haha I second this . And I agree with whoever said Jagex controls the game too much as well…

Read full topic
item.source: Will You Enjoy the Christmas 2006 Event in Old School Runescape?

item.title: Will You Enjoy the Christmas 2006 Event in Old School Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:4, topic:535967”]I don’t know about this spam bot topic but did anyone read this interesting article http://services.runescape.com/m=forum/forums.ws?317,318,84,65216337 has some great details about the rs2 engine.[/quote]They did a livestream today where they tested the Rooftop Agility publicly on their test server. They were setting their levels (::setstat <skill_name> ), giving themselves items to test with (::give <item_name> ), teleporting (::tele ), and a lot of other things that I was surprised to see publicly.

Read full topic
item.source: Will You Enjoy the Christmas 2006 Event in Old School Runescape?

item.title: Will You Enjoy the Christmas 2006 Event in Old School Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Holidays are all about rares… in fact this game is all about rares which aren’t rare anymore since Jagex is controlling the game too much. So no… I won’t.

Read full topic
